homeHeader.title: Drive Engagement, Boost Morale, & Win Talent with Our Seamless Company Car Registration Solutions in Dubai
homeHeader.description: Frustrated with the UAE's stringent technical inspections, heavy documentation, and compliance requirements? At One Nexuz, we handle the entire process, from filing paperwork to securing insurance, so you can focus on core business activities. Build a healthy, more productive workplace, minimise transport costs, and diversify business assets with top-notch registered company vehicles.

sec1.title: Register Your Company Car in Days, Not Weeks
sec1.description: Why waste time in queues and approvals? Our seamless company car registration service gets your fleet road-ready within 48 hours, so you can focus on business growth.

sec2.title: Register Your Company Car Without the Hassle — Simple Pricing that Works for You
sec2.description: No hidden fees, no confusing packages, and no surprise add-ons. Pay only for the services your business requires—vehicle registration, document handling, or compliance support—exactly when you need them.

leftSection_5.title: How We Simplify Vehicle Registration for Your Company

items.title: Book a No-Obligation Call
items.description: We'll schedule a free consultation to discuss your business needs and collect the necessary documents.

items.title: Conduct a Compliance Check
items.description: Next, our specialists will verify documents, coordinate insurance, and inspect your car to flag any gaps.

items.title: Register, Renew, or Transfer
items.description: We submit and track your car registration or renewal application with the RTA, saving you the hassle of endless office visits.

items.title: Obtain Official Documents
items.description: Lastly, we'll send your registration documents and number plates to your preferred address, as well as set renewal reminders.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can I register or renew a company car without an Emirates ID?
items.answer: No, an Emirates ID is vital for registering a company car, as well as renewing your registration.

items.question: What documents do I need to register my company car?
items.answer: Generally, you'll need a trade license, Emirates ID, vehicle purchase invoice, insurance certificate, and an authorisation letter from the company, depending on your selected company car and jurisdiction.

items.question: Can I renew my company car online in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, our experts allow you to handle your company car renewals entirely online and stay compliant without risking penalties or losing valuable time.”

items.question: How long does it take to register a company vehicle?
items.answer: It takes 1-2 working days to register your company vehicle, depending on the readiness of the documents and the size of your fleet.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer support for de-registering a car in Dubai, UAE?
items.answer: Yes, our certified professionals can assist you with registering or deregistering a company car anywhere in the UAE.
